name: Gravity
body:
To compile:

javac Gravity.java Space.java Player.java Planet.java Vec2D.java UserInput.java

To run:

java Gravity (rows) (cols)


User Input:

     - w (Thrusts ship down)
     - s (Thrusts ship up)
     - a (Thrusts ship right)
     - d (Thrusts ship left)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
